title: Ticket #2578: Warnings in generic_stats on newer gcc.
description:
When compiling with newer GCC versions, I get the following versions many, many times in the condor compile. 

/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h: In member function ‘T ring_buffer<T>::Push(T) [with T = int]’:
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:521:13:   instantiated from ‘T stats_entry_recent<T>::Add(T) [with T = int]’
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:567:47:   instantiated from ‘stats_entry_recent<T>& stats_entry_recent<T>::operator+=(T) [with T = int]’
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:803:42:   instantiated from here
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:299:7: warning: operation on ‘((ring_buffer<int>*)this)->ring_buffer<int>::ixHead’ may be undefined [-Wsequence-point]
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h: In member function ‘T ring_buffer<T>::Push(T) [with T = double]’:
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:521:13:   instantiated from ‘T stats_entry_recent<T>::Add(T) [with T = double]’
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:567:47:   instantiated from ‘stats_entry_recent<T>& stats_entry_recent<T>::operator+=(T) [with T = double]’
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:803:56:   instantiated from here
/home/bbockelm/projects/condor/src/condor_utils/generic_stats.h:299:7: warning: operation on ‘((ring_buffer<double>*)this)->ring_buffer<double>::ixHead’ may be undefined [-Wsequence-point]
creator: bbockelm
